topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559f31f26368725a04000081#post_559f31f26368725a04000081
To be fair he does have a point; you have a habit of getting upset whenever we don't like something you like and expecting us to like it as well and getting further upset whenever we don't show similar interests.

It's kind of a dick thing of me, but the other day when you were streaming anime you got upset at us for not dropping what we were doing and watching it with you.  A)A lot of us have jobs B)A lot of us have school/college C)A lot of us have families.  When you were streaming the anime I was studying for a test in a class I've been struggling with.

You can't just get mad at us every time we talk about something that isn't pokemon/precure/sentai/etc cause most people here only have a couple hours free a day so we tend to watch anime we like; hell I'll admit now I'm thinking about watching jojo cause from what I've heard it's a really good anime, *BUT* I'll have to watch it during my summer break which is only *two weeks*  Sure if you want to suggest people watch a anime then by all means do so, but don't get pissy whenever something pops up that you don't like.

Tl:dr; Don't get pissy at us because when was the last time anyone here on the reverse side of the coin ever shit talked you for talking about how you find jewelpets sexy or such?



I *might* watch jojo during my summer break, but my keep in mind I only get two weeks free out of the entire year off from school.

topics.body:
"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559f33a463687279b10001ff#post_559f33a463687279b10001ff
Oh yo ya me cuento entre sus grandes fans. No deja de impresionarme como pudo interesarnos tanto en personajes que apenas conocimos en el video y que encima no hablan. Concuerdo, ese estilo lo he visto antes, o por lo menos uno muy semejante: se trata de un juego llamado Penny Arcade Adventures; salió hace mucho como un juego para Xbox Live. Es una aventura gráfica, muy chistosa por el demo que jugué. Ahora bie fue hace años y mi recuerdo esá un poco oxidado, pero ahí es donde cre haber visto ese tipo de dibujo.
Admemás le han hecho buen fanart, bisca en esta misma página, Lewis y el primero qe verás es de mis peferidos. Es la calaca, sólo que com carne y tocándole el violín a la Rarity del cuadro.

topics.body:
Hasn't the entire point of the Time Wasting Thread been to post random crap? I mean, it's a thread with intentionally no theme. Chances are we're going to have stuff you won't always like.

It always ends in at least three pages, though, so if you hang on for long enough, it will always end. Which is why I love it here. I love all of you, and seeing the variety and spectrum of things you're interested in. It's great.

"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/559f3574636872615f000588#post_559f3574636872615f000588

...dare I ask of your experience?
